amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to decreasing Federal funding for local jurisdictions that defund the police.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3113 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 328.

action.text: Amendment SA 3113 proposed by Senator Tuberville. (consideration: CR S6216-6217; text: CR S6216-6217) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to decreasing Federal funding for local jurisdictions that defund the police.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3113 proposed by Senator Tuberville.
